amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to restore a sensible definition of full-time employee for purposes of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 144 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 144 proposed by Senator Collins.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 144 proposed by Senator Collins.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 144 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
